rev.desc.rev.desc: Update information in UI when execute upgrade task
Support field level merge for renamed APM/Upgrade result
Do not purge upgradeconfiguration for start purge
Support field level merge for renamed APM/Upgrade result
Do not purge upgradeconfiguration during upgrade
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade steps: allow not to execute purge manually
Add preupgrade type similar as finished and do not remove dbdict upgradestatus but just reset it
Modified the message style from "dbdict: upgradebdmmapping is purged." to "dbdict: Purged upgradebdmmapping"
Optimized upgrade log during applying OOB package and custom package.
Refactor the panles and revise the logs
Modification made for DevTx ticket I2219.

Because the unique key for the displayevent and displayoption files were changed in SC6.1, it is important that the upgrade version of these two files not only are reset but actually deleted from the system as part of the preparation for the upgrade. Change made to this application so that if this application is being called from the beginning of the upgrade ( Purge Type [the name parameter] is "start" ), it purges the upgradedisplayevent and the upgradedisplayoption files.

Because the unique key for the displayevent and displayoption files were changed in SC6.1, it is important that the upgrade version of these two files not only are reset but actually deleted from the system as part of the preparation for the upgrade. Change made to this application so that if this application is being called from the beginning of the upgrade ( Purge Type [the name parameter] is "start" ), it purges the upgradedisplayevent and the upgradedisplayoption files.
